ygData.subject: Thinking about adventuring to Guk tonight- advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been in and around Ro and the Commons for about a week now and I m starting to feel more adventures.    I decided on Guk to try to score some Netted,
ygData.messageBody:
I've been in and around Ro and the Commons for about a week now and I'm
starting to feel more adventures. I decided on Guk to try to score
some Netted, Woven and/or Mesh armor. If there are any wizards out
there who can give me some advice on what and where to hunt in Guk or
the Swamp, it would be greatly appreciated. Right now I'm level 9 and
have a couple of other mages and monks who have shown some interest in
this endeavor.

Malkin
Fennin Ro
